data.title: How Do I Create My Team?

description: vpl offers you the chance to play Fantasy Cricket across leagues and international matches. With vpl Fantasy, everyone can use their skills, analytical reasoning, and knowledge of cricket to form squads, enter contests, and play fantasy cricket cash contests. Users can also improve their team selection skills with our fantasy tips. </br></br>vpl even offers users free practice matches that can help them enhance a new user's skills. vpl allows you to make a dream team with real-life players to play a real-life match. So what are you waiting for? Play Fantasy Cricket daily on vpl now!

Download the vpl app and sign up with your mobile number. Choose Fantasy Cricket. Once you do this, you will be shown a list of upcoming matches or upcoming cricket tournaments that you can participate in. You can select an upcoming match with your favorite team playing, which you want to take part in from the Indian t20 league or any other league, and start making your fantasy team.</br></br> A cricket-crazy nation like India cannot get enough of the sport and vpl enables its users to join multiple contests for a particular match as well, which will have various prize money to be won depending upon the entry fee. You will get 100 credits with which you can choose your pick of real-life players for your fantasy XI team. The player to score the most points will win big prizes.
You need 11 players to make a team and play fantasy cricket:
You can select a maximum of 7 players from one playing side and try out different combinations of your choice. Every user must choose their players by following team selection criteria given above.
You can manage your fantasy squads for a match from the 'Your Teams' section. This section can be found in every match on the vpl Fantasy Cricket app.

data.text: How many teams can I create for a single match?

description: A player can create from one team to multiple teams with various different player combinations to increase his/her chances of winning big cash prizes. The maximum number of squads one can create depends on the contest category that starts with a minimum of two teams and can keep increasing.

For exavple, a user can create a maximum of 40 teams in a Rumble Cricket Fantasy contest. The more the teams, the more the chances of winning cash rewards. vpl is a popular app where many cricket-crazy fans have won big prizes.

content: Captain - The player you choose to be your pro-Fantasy Cricket team's Captain will receive 2X points. Scoring points become easy if you pick the right captain.

Vice-Captain - The player you choose to be your Vice-Captain will receive a 1.5X boost on the points scored by the selected player. After getting your captain pick right, this selection plays a key role in winning big money as it can fetch a user maximum points.

Starting points are assigned to players on the basis of the announcement of their inclusion in the playing XI. However, in case a player doesn't start after being included, he/she will not score points. Points will be awarded (including starting points) to the replacement in such cases.  However, sports fans are always up to date with team news.
Strike rate scoring is applicable only for strike rates below 70 runs per 100 balls.
A player will not earn points from the events taking place during a Super Over.

Data is provided by reliable sources and once the points are allotted with the winners getting declared, no further adjustments will be made. Points awarded live in-game are subject to change as long as the status is 'In progress' or 'Waiting for review'.

data.firstLineToshow: Players are awarded points based on their performance. The points system varies based on the format of the match, such as ODIs, Tests, T20Is, etc.
contentList: You should know the points system at the back of your hands as this is what ultimately decides your winnings.
Find out all about the points system

components.name: H2header
components.id: How Do I Create My Team?

data.header: How Do I Create My Team?

description: Go to the vpl Fantasy Sports tab and click 'Select a match.' , Now click on 'Add team' and create your teams and play. You can also select a contest and then click on 'Register team', where you will be prompted to select the existing team or create a new team.

content.name: Can I change my vpl pro-Fantasy Cricket Team?
description: You can make as many changes as you like to your vpl fantasy team until the registration deadline for that match. You can also change your Captain or Vice Captain before the deadline. Select the 'Edit Team' button on the top right corner of your squad to make any changes.

Make sure you know which of your players are playing the match and keep your session updated at all times on the vpl Fantasy Cricket app. You can manage your squad ranging from a single game contest to big tournaments.

content.name: Unmatched features offered by vpl Fantasy Cricket
description: Withdrawal is as sivple a process as adding to your vpl wallet money, where you either put your bank account details or link your UPI ID/Paytm/Net banking.

Players can avail unlimited withdrawals of your Fantasy Cricket winnings on the vpl app where the winnings go directly into your bank account! Sign up today to compete in cash contests and play fantasy sports to earn real money!

content.name: Is playing Fantasy Cricket on vpl absolutely safe and legal?
description: Yes! Fantasy Cricket is classified as a game of skill as per the judgments of the Bombay High Court and the Punjab and Haryana High Court. These judgments have also been affirmed by the Supreme Court. It is covpletely safe and legal to use your cricketing knowledge and analytical skills to join contests, play fantasy games online, and score more points to win money!

content.title: 5 Tips to Select the Best Team to Win in Fantasy Cricket
content.description: Fantasy cricket is an online sports game where the users have to select the best of 11 players for their team. The user can choose a group of players from both the playing teams.
